abstract: Exxon Mobil senior vice president Andrew P Swiger warns Europe could miss chance to reduce its dependence on imported energy by making it too difficult to develop shale gas and so-called unconventional resources; says gas fields supplying Europe will decline, raising dependence on imports.
snippet: An energy conference was told that new extraction processes could reduce dependence on foreign oil.
lead_paragraph: An energy conference was told that new extraction processes could reduce dependence on foreign oil.

headline.main: Oil Executive Promotes Shale Gas to Europeans
headline.print_headline: Oil Executive Promotes Shale Gas to Europeans
headline.seo: Exxon Executive Promotes Shale Gas to Europeans
